headline: Teledyne FLIR and VSI Labs Testing Shows How Thermal Imaging Helps Vehicle Makers Meet Nighttime AEB Federal Safety Standards
summary: GOLETA, Calif., December 10, 2024--Teledyne FLIR OEM with VSI Labs today issued test results utilizing the new FMVSS No. 127 pedestrian automatic emergency braking (PAEB) testing plan.
